name: Opossum The Killing Machine
description:
Opossum the Killing Machine is a FPS where the player will be an American opossum taken on the Soviet Union. Right now I have zombies as placeholders for soldiers, but in the release the zombies will only be in the mini games and the player will be fighting animal characters with human like qualities. Look forward to the release of Opossum The Killing Machine early 2016.

Controls

Move - w,s,a,d or arrow keys

Look - mouse

Shoot - Left Mouse Click

Reload - r key

Run - Shift key

Action/Open Doors - f key
